creator: joelr@viair.com
text:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add several appenders to an AsyncAppender.
2. Log some events.
3. Call Category.shutdown().

Results:
VM enters Category.shutdown() and never returns.

Expected:
ASyncAppender should flush any attached appenders and close without hanging.

creator: bugzilla@apache.org
text: Thanks Joel. This was indeed a deadlock problem. Just fixed it. Ceki
